alert.note: Alert for Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 5:47PM EDT until May 09 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 547 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nixonville, or 7 miles northeast of Red Hill, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Red Hill, Hickory Grove, Horry Georgetown Technical College Conway Campus, Hand, Nixonville, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Coastal Carolina University, Forestbrook, Briarcliffe Acres, Atlantic Beach, Lighthouse Care Center Of Conway, Conway Medical Center and Grand Strand Regional Medical Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
